name: Rorschach (itch) (EmCannon)
description:
Rorschach is a precise, experimental puzzle platformer amalgamation thing where you use paint to reveal your surroundings.

Spiritual successor to the WhyCardBoard game "Rorschach" -- Available at https://whycardboard.itch.io/rorschach

~ ~ ~

Features

- Over 70 levels to conquer
- Beautiful, minimalist art style
- Music by Rolemusic

~ ~ ~
